Donate

Presidents Circle

Each year, the Board directs Presidents Circle funding to a handful of key initiatives and ongoing priorities. Please see our impact report to learn about our initiatives and priorities from last year

Donate View Report

For over 50 years, the Boys & Girls Clubs of the Coachella Valley has accomplished its goals of opening doors and transforming lives by providing a safe place where young people can be themselves, be proud, and experience opportunities never thought possible. To make the possible possible, we depend on support, your support. Our funding does not come from public funds. It comes from private individuals and private foundations that recognize the value of their investment. Every gift is managed by our Board of Directors with the utmost fiscal responsibility, fiduciary oversight, and transparent financial management.

Bound by their shared commitment to Boys & Girls Clubs of Coachella Valley, members of the Presidents Circle assist Board President John Powell, in advancing the Clubs’ distinctive mission: To save and enhance the lives of the young people of our community, especially those with economic and/or social needs by offering a safe haven and meaningful youth development services provided by a caring and qualified staff.

Members of Presidents Circle make a minimum unrestricted $1,000 cash gift annually. Their contributions are designated toward those immediate and long-term priorities that speak to BGCofCV unique calling.
